mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (client_email, client_name, jira_id, phone_number, project_description, project_name, admin_id, project_lead) VALUES (#{clientEmail}, #{clientName},#{jiraId}, #{phoneNumber}, #{projectDescription}, #{projectName}, #{adminId}, #{projectLead})
